qa_pairs.question: Measuring from the closest point of each object, which of these objects (window, chair, heater, or suitcase) is the closest to the standing lamp?['A. window', 'B. chair', 'C. heater', 'D. suitcase']
Measuring from the closest point of each object, which of these objects (basket, bedstool, plant, or couch) is the closest to the shoesrack?['A. basket', 'B. bedstool', 'C. plant', 'D. couch']
Measuring from the closest point of each object, which of these objects (couch, plant, bed, or chair) is the closest to the standing lamp?['A. couch', 'B. plant', 'C. bed', 'D. chair']
Measuring from the closest point of each object, which of these objects (plant, heater, sidetable, or fan) is the closest to the bed?['A. plant', 'B. heater', 'C. sidetable', 'D. fan']
Measuring from the closest point of each object, which of these objects (shoesrack, bed, basket, or night stand) is the closest to the plant?['A. shoesrack', 'B. bed', 'C. basket', 'D. night stand']
Measuring from the closest point of each object, which of these objects (heater, fan, plant, or standing lamp) is the closest to the coatrack?['A. heater', 'B. fan', 'C. plant', 'D. standing lamp']
Measuring from the closest point of each object, which of these objects (standing lamp, fan, plant, or bed) is the closest to the window?['A. standing lamp', 'B. fan', 'C. plant', 'D. bed']
Measuring from the closest point of each object, which of these objects (basket, bedstool, couch, or heater) is the closest to the bed?['A. basket', 'B. bedstool', 'C. couch', 'D. heater']
Measuring from the closest point of each object, which of these objects (fan, shoesrack, couch, or basket) is the closest to the plant?['A. fan', 'B. shoesrack', 'C. couch', 'D. basket']

Measuring from the closest point of each object, which of these objects (shoesrack, fan, coatrack, or sidetable) is the closest to the standing lamp?['A. shoesrack', 'B. fan', 'C. coatrack', 'D. sidetable']
